data:
it wont be long
till im in your town
so please, wont you wait
so please, just a bit wait
till ill be
in your arm
in your hug
in your sight
ill be with you in no time
oh my love

hey what time is it
i feel like its getting too dark now
hey what time is it
dont worry girl i have all day now
take your time
theres nothing that could rush you now
so take your time
ill find a way to get through this wait


hey what day is it?
i kinda lost track help me here now
hey what day is it?
dont wory girl ill just wait you now
take your time
theres nothing that could rush you now
so take your time ill find a way to get through this wait


oh girl oh how i long for you
seeing you up close till the sun gets up
stealing time to hit the snooze button
one more time


ill post something on instagram
ill tweet a piece of my thought too
in case you wouldnt notice
take your time


ill post something on instagram
ill tweet a piece of my thought too
in case you wouldnt notice
perhaps im being obnoxius
in case you wouldnt notice
well take your time and ill be here

i know you were nervous
i know you know how awkward
the atmostphere between us


i know you were nervous
you smoked that fast
you are confuse about
how you should call me


you left me again
after you said sorry
for not being able
to visit me
as soon as possible


there will be no more
holding hands
midnight snacks
or goodnight kisses
there will be
no more you and me


in twenty minutes
we still able to talk about our lives
there's still time,
we still able to talk about
our favourite band


still you left me again
after you said sorry
for not being able
to visit me
as soon as possible


there will be no more
holding hands
midnight snacks
or goodnight kisses
there will be
no more you and me

biar kuantar kau pulang
hari tlah semakin larut
pakai jaketmu
tambah selimut
ku takut kau masuk angin


biar kuantar kau pulang
hari semakin kelabu
pakai jaketmu
tambah jaketku
ku takut kau masuk angin


semoga lekas tiba kita
sebelum badai menerpa
dan kau semakin tak keruan
panas dingin
hingga demam

kadang kepalamu
terasa berat tidak keruan
meronta khianati inginmu
kadang pikiranmu
agak sulit
untuk diatur
tersesat oleh ragu yang membelenggu


padahal hari ini sedang cukup cerah
namun hatimu masih saja
mendung menggelayut
ditambah kian sedih hatiku
satt air matamu menggantung
di lekuk pipimu


coba utarakan kepadaku
tak perlu risau
berbalut pilu
utarakanlah tak perlu khawatir
tapi, kalau kamu masih belum mau


tidak mengapa
ambil setiap jengkal waktumu
jangan kahawatir terburu-buru
I'm Sorry It Took Me Two Years To Realize That You Don't Love Me Anymore

it's been a while
it's been so long
since the day that we have met
it's been like forever
since the day i saw your smile


it's been a while
it's been so long
and now you've gone
and i have lost
the smile that warms my heart
to the moon and back


sometimes you turn to your other side
makes me fall for it
while yoiu hop around
some nights just fall
like i used to go
for any side of you


it's been a while
it's been so long
since the day we talk to each
and now i missed you
though there's nothing i can do
and now have come the day for me
to let you go
to let you pass
and now i cried
and yet i cried
for no one


sometimes you turn to your other side
makes me fall for it
while yoiu hop around
some nights just fall
like i used to go
for any side of you


i'm sorry it took me two years to realize
that you don't love me anymore
